key.lore.logos.tooltip.name: λόγος
key.lore.logos.tooltip.description:
[key.mechanic.logos] (pronounced low-goss), meaning [key.flavour.divine]('Word of Power') or [key.flavour.divine]('Divine Word').
[key.mechanic.logos] are emanations of the fundamental, structured principles of the [key.lore.kenoma] in the form of spoken words.
The deeper the speaker's understanding, that is, their [key.lore.gnosis]('Gnosis',) the more powerful these emanations will be.
More complex [key.mechanic.logos] require profound insight into the governing principles of reality, such that most [key.lore.logikos] are gated from all but the weakest and most shallow of [key.mechanic.logos].
